description: This trap indicates that call admission into the GSX has been
suspended. Information provided by this trap includes the reason
why call admission has been suspended.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusNodeResourcesCallAdmissionSuspendedNotification SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallAdmissionChangeReason s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The reason why the call admission control state has changes.
variables.name: SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallAdmissionChangeReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that call admission into the GSX has been
enabled. Information provided by this trap includes the reason
why call admission has been enabled.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusNodeResourcesCallAdmissionEnabledNotification SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallAdmissionChangeReason s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The reason why the call admission control state has changes.
variables.name: SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallAdmissionChangeReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that call trace filter had a hit.
Information provided by this trap includes the called number
and the calling number.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusNodeResourcesCallTraceHitNotification SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallTraceCalledNumber s EXAMPLE SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallTraceCallingNumber s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The called number being traced.
variables.name: SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallTraceCalledNumber

description: The calling number being traced.
variables.name: SONUS-NODE-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusCallTraceCallingNumber

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
